findings.title: Improved Sanity Checks of MsgAddLiquidity()
findings.description: The `ValidateBasic()` function in `MsgAddLiquidity` message type lacks checks on `MaxTokenAAmount` and `MaxTokenBAmount`, only ensuring that `MaxTokenAAmount` is positive.

findings.title: Possible Front-Running For Reduced Return
findings.description: In the OpenSwap contract, the swap operation respects the `minAmountOut` threshold but may not be sufficient against sophisticated front-running attacks that could lead to a smaller return for trading users.

findings.title: Lack of Accepting Liquidity Donation in Current Pools
findings.description: The current execution path does not support liquidity donation which can increase pool valuation, reduce trading slippage and provide a better user experience.
